module.name: faqop
module.displayName: SEO FAQ Blocks on Any Page (Products, Categories, etc.)
module.description: Add FAQ lists with Schema Markup to any pages (product, category, etc.) to make them Google SEO friendly. Set rules of display by page, currency, language, customer group. Shortcodes and hooks, unlimited, custom and standard. And a separate FAQ page.
module.author: Opossum Dev
